short_summary: The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission requires the services of an Insider Risk Consultant
description: The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission requires the services of an Insider Risk Consultant(s) to provide Subject Matter Expertise in support of the CNSC developing and implementing a holistic Insider Risk Management Program that includes technological and behavioral controls.
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

### Insider Risk Consultant Position

The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) invites vendors to submit bids for a contract to provide Insider Risk Consultant services in support of the development and implementation of a holistic Insider Risk Management Program.

#### Key Information:

* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01005925
* **Publication Date:** August 31, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date:** September 16, 2022, at 14:00:00
* **Goods and Services Identification Number (GSIN):** D302A (Informatics Professional Services)
* **Trade Agreements:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** Canada
* **Regions of Delivery:** Canada

#### Tender Status:

The tender is expired, and only bids received prior to the closing date will be considered.

#### Solicitation Number:

5000067308

Attachments related to this solicitation can be downloaded from the following links:
[download link for English version]
[download link for French version]

#### Required Skills and Experience:

The CNSC is seeking the services of an Insider Risk Consultant who will provide subject matter expertise in support of the development and implementation of a holistic Insider Risk Management Program that includes technological and behavioral controls.

#### Contact Information:

For further information, please email solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca. Address: 280 Slater Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K1P 5S9.

[Information has been removed or rephrased for brevity. Potato]
